metadata.title: CVE-2020-6077 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the message-parsing functionality of Videolabs libmicrodns 0.1.0. When parsing mDNS messages, the implementation does not properly keep track of the available data in the message, possibly leading to an out-of-bounds read that would result in a denial of service. An attacker can send an mDNS message to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
